GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array of the requested article using the article ID

articles.title: Running a Node App
articles.author: jessjelly
articles.body: This is part two of a series on how to get up and running with Systemd and Node.js. This part dives deeper into how to successfully run your app with systemd long-term, and how to set it up in a production environment.

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles (allows sorting queries)

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of the comments on the requested article using the article ID

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: creates a new comment on the requested article using the article ID

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: increments the votes of requested article using the article ID
